message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this split makes sense.
I understand you want to be fair, Alice, but this split reflects the time value of the money for both of us.
Bob, my offer is still more than fair considering the time value. It's better to take a reasonable deal now.
Alice, it seems we both value our time. Let's settle this fairly with a 50/50 split before inflation eats away at the value any further.
